ticket.title: Submit Ticket
ticket.description: Describe the issue you encountered, and our support team will reply via email as soon as possible.
ticket.feedbackDescription: Logs are being uploaded. Please describe the issue you encountered. The logs will help us locate the problem faster.
ticket.subjectPlaceholder: Briefly describe the issue you encountered
ticket.contentPlaceholder: Please describe the issue in detail, including steps, error messages, etc. This will help us resolve it faster.
ticket.submitFailed: Ticket submission failed, please try again later
ticket.emailReplyHint: Our support team will communicate with you via email. Please watch for replies in your inbox.
ticket.howItWorksDescription: After submission, the system will send the ticket to the support email and copy it to your registered email. Subsequent communication will be via email. Please ensure you can receive email notifications.
ticket.entryDescription: Encountered an issue? Submit a ticket and we'll reply soon

issues.entryDescription: View questions from other users and official replies
issues.emptyHint: No issues have been submitted yet
issues.error: Failed to load, please try again
